content: During the quarter, we completed an important 49,000 square foot renewal with Microsoft in the base of 555, resulting in a significant 19.8% cash mark to market as well as the new triple-digit rent lease with a global private equity firm in the 7,000 square foot suite in the building’s tower. Had we not done – if we – the program is going to yield, let’s say, it’s a 2.5 million square foot rent that we’re building and the rents are going to go up somewhere $35, $40 or something like that. And as we look – Michael, as we look at the – I know that you’re not giving distinct guidance, but from the $0.81 run rate that you gave in fourth quarter, you’re now having an extra $750 million of disposed higher interest rates.
